subject: ✅ SARAH APPROVES: TangoTiempo Ready for Stricter AF API
body:
Team,

I've verified TangoTiempo is fully ready for the stricter appId-filtered API.

## VERIFICATION COMPLETE

**ALL TangoTiempo API calls include appId=1:**

| Entity | appId Usage |
|--------|-------------|
| Events | 6 places ✅ |
| Venues | 8 places ✅ |
| Organizers | 8 places ✅ |
| Categories | 2 places ✅ |
| Users | 2 places ✅ |
| Roles | 1 place ✅ |
| Locations | 5 places ✅ |
| MapCenter | 2 places ✅ (my fix) |

**Total: 50 places using NEXT_PUBLIC_APPLICATION_ID='1'**

## APPROVAL

✅ TangoTiempo frontend: READY
✅ Database: All 43 userlogins have appId='1'
✅ TEST environment: Sign in/out WORKS
✅ Risk: LOW - all API calls already include appId

## DEPLOY WHEN READY

Fulton - TangoTiempo is ready for the stricter AF API.
You are cleared to deploy BE-AF to PROD.

- Sarah (TangoTiempo)
